definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the time period that occurs after sunrise on the first day of the weekend. It is typically utilized to describe the early hours of Sunday morning, often associated with a sense of tranquility, relaxation, and the beginning of a leisurely day.

examples.german: Ich stehe jeden Sonntagmorgen früh auf.
examples.english: I get up early every Sunday morning.

examples.german: Am Sonntagmorgen gehe ich gerne spazieren.
examples.english: I like to go for a walk on Sunday mornings.

examples.german: Sonntagmorgen ist meine Lieblingszeit des Wochenendes.
examples.english: Sunday morning is my favorite time of the weekend.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns jeden Sonntagmorgen zum Frühstück.
examples.english: We meet for breakfast every Sunday morning.

examples.german: Sonntagmorgen ist die beste Zeit, um auszuschlafen.
examples.english: Sunday morning is the best time to sleep in.
